reviewText: The DVD wasn't the same as shown on the case.  It was the same as the Hallmark Collector set V.3
These type of movies are enjoyable because of the lack of violence, sex and profanity and hopefully these types will make a comeback.
For the $5.99 I paid it was great value.  The movie In His Shoes was worth the price alone.  Very good family movies with moral lessons.
perfect

THIS SET OF DVDS WERE SO HEARTWARMING. IT WAS SO GOOD TO SEE NICE CLEAN SHOWS. WE WERE TRULY ENTERTAINED. WE HOPE TO BUY MORE IN THE NEAR FUTURE. YOU CAN ALWAYS COUNT ON HALLMARK TO PRODUCE GOOD MOVIES.

These movies were really good. All of them. Not for all ages. they are entertaining and more adult themed.
The war one was really good. showed a peace during times of stress. All the acting is surperbly done.
I will watch them every year at holiday time.

Video as described.  That said, I like enjoyable stories, family friendly and no objectionable material for family viewing.  This fit the bill.  This was purchased for a family weekend with a variety of personalities and ages, and we loved it.  I will absolutely be getting more like these.

I like Hallmark movies very much.  I just wish I had know that this set was not closed-captioned.  My husband is very hearing impared (even with hearing aids) and he enjoys a movie much better with the closed-captions.  Without them I have to keep pausing the movie and telling him what they are saying.

I had already seen three of these movies and absolutely loved them.  The one I had not seen before was just as good as the others.  My favorite would probably be Silent Night.  They all have great actors and great storylines.
I have not received Miracle on 34th St. nor It's A Wonderful Life. I only liked 2 of the 4 video's in Vol. 3 from Hallmark.
IT'S A NICE WAY TO SPEND TIME WITH YOUR FAMILY, AND JUST ENJOY THE TIME TOGETHER, THE MOVIES AREN'T SOMETHING THAT ONE  WOULD FELL AFRAID TO SHOW, JUST CLEAN, AND WONDERFUL, VERY ENJOYABLE!

I really enjoyed Out of the Woods and Where There's a Will. Both stories have an estranged family member. A reconciliation and family love. Both involve making choices as to how to carry one afterwords.

Uplifting.
I love it.  I love watching the movies.  And will be buying more than this one.  My husband and I both love these movies.
Can't beat the price - 4 movies for the price of one!  I enjoyed each of the movies in this 4 movie pack.
Just good movies of general interest and to pass the time. Nothing outstanding but then nothing objectionable either from where I sit.

I was not  able to show this movie in church for all age group without having to worry about bad language I guess you should let me know of the movies you have that is children friendly but; will also interest adults as well.
Got it for gifts to my family but I had seen all of the movies on it and knew they would like them.

This set was as described. Hallmark always has movies that the whole family can watch without being afraid that it might not be appropriate for children. I don't have children to watch, but I don't like filthy language and a lot of other stuff in the new movies either.
Purchased these DVD's for my Mother and she is enjoying watching them.  Hallmark always makes movies with morals and values to the stories, that is why my Mother likes that type of program.

Need to watch these special packs as this 4 pk. has 1 movie that is on a 10 pk. group. This has happened twice now.
I do add that postage fair and I am enjoying these family movies.not seen in Australia. Hallmark vol 3..
I enjoyed every movie.  They were wonderful.  They were all different but everyone was intriguing and I would really recommend them. I was home ill and watched all four one day.

These 4 movies were wonderful family type movies, but also adult intertainment without bad language.  I would purchase them again. I purchased them from Amazon.  I also enjoy dealing with Amazon.  Thanks
Hallmark made for TV movies are a great source of family intertainment. There are four great movies on each disk, making it a great value.

I have watch all four,movies, and they
are really good.  Will watch them over and over.
The dvd was sent quckly also.

I keep forgetting that Hallmark is not as restricted as formerly.  These topics deal with war (a well-made video but not for kids), some far out philosophies and abnormal relationships.  Not for folks who are attempting to instill wholesome values in their kids.
This movie collection was purchased for a gift.  I don't know if the recipient has watched them, but with Hallmard movies, how can you go wrong!

Ordered this for Out of The Woods and was super pleased with the movie. Ed Asner did a fantastic job in this movie. Silent Night was done very well. I have watched it three times already. Battle of the Bulge time placement movie for those who do not know. The enemies getting along with each other and supporting each other. In His Father's Shoes was done very well. I will be happy to watch it again and again. Have not seen Where there's a Will yet.
As advertised, quick delivery
